title: police when asked for bodycam footage be like

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, kill a player, but clean them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You don't lose your ability if you kill a town player until the role of that player is discovered mechanically (through a role which uncovers cleaned bodies)
- **__Part of the Daily Streak faction__**
